Hopefully it will get her an audition!<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p>To the Producers of <em>America&#39;s Worst Cooks</em>:</p><p>The lasagna I made recently is the worst you will ever taste.&nbsp; First and foremost, instead of light fluffy layers of pasta and ricotta cheese, my lasagna was a tooth-cracking rock.&nbsp; In addition, the parts of my lasagna that didn&#39;t break your teeth were a gelatinous mass of cheesy goo that did not hold together.&nbsp; Also, I cooked the lasagna too long, so the bottom two or three layers were burnt to a charcoal-flavored crisp.&nbsp; Last but not least, when I took the lasagna out of the oven, my family members suddenly remembered that&nbsp;they had other things to do, and left.&nbsp; The bottom line is, even though I&#39;m Italian, I can&#39;t cook to save my life, and my lasagna is the worst you will ever eat.<br /><br />Incompetent Chef</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>"}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_9ec75fe9-0968-5d1a-6d38-b24e6ca13f02":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"It is pretty good.
